main event: An unidentified flying object resembling a star was observed traveling east in Long Beach, California on September 27, 1963.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes, The observer described the object as disappearing after four slights lasting about 15-20 seconds, At 3:32 PM EDT, the object was not tracked by radar operators, The weather was clear with 15-18 miles visibility, A military officer suggested the description resembled that of a meteor.
witness description: Mr. John Doe, reported the sighting from Belmont Beach.
